Class GoPrimeApplication

java.lang.Object

              org.smscom.prime.extension.goprime.GoPrimeApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.restlet.Uniform, IMessageHandler, IPrimeApplication
public class GoPrimeApplication
extends PrimeApplication

Applications should extend this class in order to benefit from the PRIME framework.

Author:
Mauro Caporuscio
